content.raw:
The textures for the starting pen, speed limit sign, lamp post, and construction cone do not show up in sensor cameras, even when using ``fix_texture_loading`` branch. See [gazebo issue 239](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/gazebo/issue/239) ... damn Steven was faster. :) ... it is a gazebo problem and not a gazebo_models problem in my opinion. The stop sign and ranger textures show up properly because they're being loaded via ogre material script and not through the textures embedded in the dae.

Using primitive collision models instead of the full meshes would probably also be good for most models, at least the dynamic ones (e.g. construction cone and barrel).
